verifications.description: Do not use deprecated Gradle configurations
Ensure that the build log does not contain any error log messages

issues.description: Version 'javaVersion' is set to an older version (1.8.0) than its corresponding default (11.0.0)
Version 'kotlinVersion' is set to an older version (1.3.72) than its corresponding default (1.4.20)

verifications.description: Ensure that the build log does not contain any warning log messages
Do not use explicit versions in your dependencies, rather have constraints on the parent build.gradle
Do not use enforcedPlatform, rather using platform.
Do not expose external dependencies as 'api' without good reason.
Do not define exclude rules. Exclusions are only allowed on configuration level.
